metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29964 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A locally-installed hostile program could send `WM_COPYDATA` messages thatFirefox would process incorrectly, leading to an out-of-bounds read. *Thisbug only affects Firefox on Windows. Other operating systems areunaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.11, Firefox < 89,and Firefox ESR < 78.11.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
